message: Hello Bob, thank you for considering purchasing our product! We're excited to discuss the details with you. As a starting point, we're willing to offer the product to you for $800000.
Thank you for your offer, Alice. I appreciate the gesture. However, given my budget constraints, I would like to propose a price of $950000 for the product.

Thank you for your counteroffer, Bob. We appreciate your interest in the product. After careful consideration, we're willing to meet you halfway. We're proposing a new price of $900000 for the product.
I appreciate your willingness to negotiate, Alice. Considering my budget, I would like to propose a price of $875000 for the product.
Thank you for your revised offer, Bob. We're still a bit apart on the price, but we're willing to make another concession. We're proposing a new price of $880000 for the product.
Thank you for your continued effort in negotiating, Alice. Based on my budget, I would like to propose a price of $870000 for the product.
Thank you for your latest offer, Bob. We're getting close, but we're still not quite there. We're willing to make another concession. We're proposing a new price of $885000 for the product.
Thank you for your offer, Alice. I appreciate your efforts. Based on my budget, I would like to propose a price of $875000 for the product.
Thank you for your revised offer, Bob. We're getting close, but we're still not quite there. We're willing to make one more concession. We're proposing a new price of $890000 for the product.
Thank you for your offer, Alice. I appreciate your efforts. Based on my budget, I would like to propose a final price of $880000 for the product.
